comments.html: Very nice podcast. Especially interesting are your comments about re-inventing the wheel. I really appreciate your comments related to the network history - they show the fundamentals of the technology (they separate marketing from the crucial things).
comments.name: Bogdan Golab

comments.html: Hi, what was the database/application used to build the network without the SDN controller?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: It's a really flexible, proprietary software package built in django with a database back end by some really smart guys. It's not a product, it was purpose built for the show.
comments.name: Nick Buraglio
